span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】n. 赞颂之词：glowing and warmly enthusiastic praise
【例】received encomiums from literary critics 受到文学评论家的好评
【近】accolade, applause, compliment恭维；称赞, eulogy, laud, panegyric颂词，赞颂, salutation 称呼；问候, tribute颂词；
【反】criticism 批评；abuse, invective, vituperation 辱骂
【记】 源自comi 高兴，欢乐；en 使 + comic 笑，高兴→使你高兴，说你好听的；welcome 欢迎时说些赞颂的话
【另】 comic 滑稽的，喜剧的，comedian 喜剧演员
